name: Numberland
description: In Numberland, kids learn the basics of financial arithmetic, including adding and subtracting money, and understanding the role of mathematics in budgeting and financial planning.

name: Savings Treehouse
description: At Savings Treehouse, children explore the importance of saving, learn about different savings strategies, and understand how regular saving contributes to financial goals.

name: Taxtown
description: In Taxtown, kids are introduced to the concept of taxes, learning how taxes work, why they are paid, and the role taxes play in society.

name: Investment Woods
description: Investment Woods teaches children about the basics of investments, including different types of investments and the concept of risk and return.

name: Loan Lake
description: At Loan Lake, kids learn about loans, interest rates, and the importance of borrowing responsibly and understanding loan agreements.

name: Imagination Jungle
description: Imagination Jungle is a creative space where kids can talk with Cleo about whatever they want. However, Cleo is a little sensitive so they will also learn how to behave well, even when talking to a chatbot.
